#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#define ll unsigned long long int
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
	int t;
	ll n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		ll a = n;
		ll b = n - 1;
		//printf("%lld %lld\n",a,b);
		if(a % 2ll == 0ll) a >>= 1;
		if(b % 2ll == 0ll) b >>= 1;
		printf("%lld\n",a*b);
	}
	return 0;
}
